PackageOracle.name: DA_FULFILLMENT
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_FULFILLMENT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.54.428603000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,fulfillment_id IN VARCHAR2
,fulfillment_dt IN DATE
,fulfillment_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_order_event_id IN NUMBER
,sales_trans_id IN VARCHAR2
,party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,fulfillment_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_fulfillment;

body.name: DA_FULFILLMENT
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_FULFILLMENT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.54.451033000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,fulfillment_id IN VARCHAR2
,fulfillment_dt IN DATE
,fulfillment_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,service_order_event_id IN NUMBER
,sales_trans_id IN VARCHAR2
,party_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_fulfillment.add, parms=' || fulfillment_id || '|' || fulfillment_dt || '|' || fulfillment_status_cd || '|' || service_order_event_id || '|' || sales_trans_id || '|' || party_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_fulfillment a
(
a.fulfillment_id
,a.fulfillment_dt
,a.fulfillment_status_cd
,a.service_order_event_id
,a.sales_trans_id
,a.party_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.fulfillment_id
,add.fulfillment_dt
,add.fulfillment_status_cd
,add.service_order_event_id
,add.sales_trans_id
,add.party_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_fulfillment.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,fulfillment_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_fulfillment.del, parms=' || fulfillment_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_fulfillment a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.fulfillment_id = del.fulfillment_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_fulfillment.del');

END del;

END da_fulfillment;
